name: Ninja-blog-dev
body:
### Welcome to Ninja-Blog Dev.
Ninja-Blog is a tiny Blogging system which uses no mySQL ! 

It comes with a rich and powerful text editor / post maker and a neat admin area to admin your blog !

So grab the latest build via GIT today and try Ninja-Blog !

Latest Zip and Tarball downloads are available at the top of this page.

More at : https://github.com/arjitc/Ninja-Blog-Dev
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
